DOC.brief_summary: This study will compare the amount of bronchial tube relaxation from the formoterol medicine contained in the symbicort pMeterd Dose Inhaler( a combination of budesonide ,a steroid, and formoterol, a drug which relaxes the bronchial smooth muscle. The comparison will be using the pMDI in the usual fashion to the pMDIs and a spacer which allows more time for breathing in the medication. Breathing tests will be measured over a 12 hour period for the comparison.
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Bronchodilation of Symbicort With and With Out Valved Holding Chamber (Aerochamber Plus)
DOC.criteria: Asthma with 15% or more increase in FEV1 after 180260 mcg of albuterol pMDI Any illness or condition which might place subject at risk in the study;e.g. some cardiovascular disorders Inability to understand and sign informed consent
